sources.title: Chuang wang li zi cheng
sources.description: Title: Chuang wang li zi cheng Summary: The kingdom of the Ming Emperor is being over run. He decides to kill himself and his daughter - but she escapes with a severe injury. She is helped by a female warrior and hopes to defeat the invaders. Directed by: Hsi-Chieh Lai, Sung Pe Liu Actors: Production Company: Kam Yeung Film Co. Release Date: 18 January 2005 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 2.35 : 1 The kingdom of the Ming Emperor is being over run. He decides to kill himself and his daughter - but she escapes with a severe injury. She is helped by a female warrior and hopes to defeat the invaders.

metadata.Plot: The kingdom of the Ming Emperor is being over run. He decides to kill himself and his daughter - but she escapes with a severe injury. She is helped by a female warrior and hopes to defeat the invaders.
metadata.Actors: Carter Wong, Nancy Yen, Lieh Lo
